context_menu_title.description: The title of the context menu action.

popup_title_sender.description: The title for the sender's name.

popup_placeholder_sender.description: The placeholder for the sender's name text box.

popup_title_message.description: The title for the message box.

popup_placeholder_message.description: The placeholder for the message's content text box.

popup_default_message.message: @greeting, I saw your apartment ad, is it still relevant? If so, I would love to hear more about it.

popup_tag_greeting.description: The tag for a greeting timed according to the time of day.

popup_tag_name.description: The tag for the sender's name.

popup_tag_website.description: The tag for the current visited website.

options_subtitle_theme.description: The 'Theme' subtitle option under the 'visuals' section.

options_theme_option_dark.description: The 'Dark' theme option under the 'Theme' option.

options_theme_option_light.description: The 'Light' theme option under the 'Theme' option.

options_subtitle_intl_call_code.description: The 'International Calling Code' subtitle option under the 'phone number' section.

options_subtitle_match_patterns.description: The 'Phone Match Patterns' subtitle option under the 'phone number' section.

options_button_add_pattern.description: The 'Add' button under the 'phone match patterns' option.

options_placeholder_patterns_input.description: The placeholder for the pattern input text box.

options_subtitle_ignored_domains.description: The 'Ignored Domains' subtitle option under the 'domains' section.
